events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it does not fit me at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on customer message regarding returning a product and wanting money back.
Your case has been assigned to a support agent who will assist you with the refund process shortly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can process your request efficiently?
The order number is 123456789. The jacket is too small for me, and I never wore it outside. I want a full refund.
We have initiated your refund process. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid label we will email you shortly.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the jacket back today.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with the resolution.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for the excellent customer service and quick handling of my issue.
We have sent you a brief satisfaction survey. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
I completed the survey and rated my experience as very positive. Thank you again for your help.
Your case has been closed. Please let us know if you need any further assistance in the future.
